overview: Anthony DeMechi has always followed the orders of his Uncle Vincent who has carved out a postion for him in the family business. However, Vincent is a cruel crime boss and Anthony's new job is in the meat packing industry -- mafioso style. He is to work alongside his cousin Gino, former Green Beret Jerry, and philosophical butcher Doc, in an effort to come up with a more effective and space saving way to dispose of victims' bodies.
title: The Grue Crew
